mapper.select: select cus_id,cus_password,cus_name,cus_sex, cus_age,cus_phone,cus_address, cus_email,cus_registration_date from customer_t order by cus_id
SELECT cus_id,cus_password,cus_name,cus_sex, cus_age,cus_phone,cus_address, cus_email,cus_registration_date from customer_t WHERE cus_id=#{cusId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_t(cus_password,cus_name, cus_sex,cus_age, cus_phone,cus_address, cus_email,cus_registration_date) VALUES (#{cusPassword},#{cusName}, #{cusSex},#{cusAge}, #{cusPhone},#{cusAddress}, #{cusEmail},#{cusRegistrationDate})
